content:
The concierge service at the Hilton Garden Inn Times Square Central is indeed a valuable resource for guests.

While the Hilton Garden Inn brand is known for its more laid-back, mid-range approach, the Times Square Central location still offers a dedicated concierge team to help you make the most of your stay in New York City.

The concierge team at the Hilton Garden Inn Times Square Central can assist with a variety of tasks, such as:

* Making reservations at local restaurants and Broadway shows
* Booking sightseeing tours and attractions
* Providing recommendations for shopping, dining, and entertainment
* Arranging for transportation and limousine services
* Helping with ticket purchases and event bookings

While they might not have the same level of personalized service as a luxury hotel, the concierge team at the Hilton Garden Inn Times Square Central is still knowledgeable and friendly, and can definitely help you with your plans and arrangements.

It's great to hear that you had a positive experience with the concierge at the Hilton in downtown Chicago! I'm sure the team at the Hilton Garden Inn Times Square Central will do their best to provide similar assistance and help make your stay in New York City unforgettable.

If you have any specific requests or questions, don't hesitate to reach out to the concierge team before your stay or during your visit. They'll be happy to help you make the most of your time in the city!
